resources.string: Welcome! What would you like to do?
Access a system as shared user
Enable Bluetooth in order to connect to your system
We were unable to connect with your camera. Please be sure to restart the camera before scanning the QR code.
Scan the QR code on the back of your camera device with your smartphone.
Next, use your security camera to scan the QR code below.
Now enter the recovery password given during the initial setup of your system.
Correct password! Please wait while we recover your access.
Enable bluetooth in order to connect with the admin\'s device.
Follow the instructions on the admin\'s device.
Show this QR Code to the admin user.
Now use this device to scan the QR Code displayed on the admin\'s device.
We were unable to connect with the admin\'s device. Please be sure both devices have Bluetooth enabled.
Please wait while the admin user finishes to delegate you access to the system.
You\'ve successfully been added as a new user!
You may now turn off Bluetooth if you\'d like.
Enable bluetooth in order to connect with the added user\'s device.
Select the added user\'s device in the list below to connect to it.
Use this device to scan the QR Code displayed on the added user\'s device.
We were unable to connect with the added user\'s device. Please be sure both devices have Bluetooth enabled.
Show this QR code to the added user.
Allow new user to access footage
Please wait while we grant access of the indicated footage to your new added user.
You\'ve successfully added a new user!
You may now turn off Bluetooth if you\'d like.
Please enable Bluetooth in order to connect to your camera device.
Scan the QR code on the back of your camera device with your smartphone.
We were unable to connect with your camera.
Next, use your security camera to scan the QR code below.
Connection successful! Please wait while we initialize your system to protect your privacy.
Choose a WiFi network for your camera to connect to.
Enter the name and password of a WiFi network for your camera to connect to.
Something went wrong with the WiFi connection. Please be sure to select a nearby network.
This password will allow you to recover access to your system should something happen to this device. Write it down somewhere safe.
I have written this password down somewhere safe and recognize that without it, I will be unable to recover access to my system if needed.
Do not forget to check the box!
You\'ve successfully completed the setup for your system!
You may now turn off Bluetooth if you\'d like.
You do not have access to view this footage. Permission can be granted by the main user of this system.
Are you sure you want to factory reset your system? You will lose all access to previously recorded videos and will have to configure from scratch your system to use it again.
You do not have access to view this footage.
The dates and times chosen are not valid.
Please wait, it might take some time...
